author: gstein
msg: (compare_and_display_lines): if provided a string (rather than a list),
then it represents a single line, not a block. jam it into a list

author: rhuijben
msg: get basename from local path. This makes sure an "F:file" path below
a working copy "F:" isn't detected as switched. (Triggered by the
"update wc on the root of a Windows drive" test)

author: rhuijben
msg: (libsvn_subr): Following up on r36425, add private/svn_patch.h to
msvc-export to fix the windows build.
